o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:Name: CanCreate
o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:Creator: RichaneRamsoedit
o:EventHandlerTargetItem.a:HandlerScript:
Function %CanCreate%(parent) Dim model : Set model = parent.Model
'Foutafhandeling wanneer er geen model is If model Is Nothing Then MsgBox "Het model object kon niet worden opgehaald" %CanCreate% = false Exit function End If
Dim pivotAttribute : pivotAttribute = model.GetExtendedAttribute("mdde_feature_business_rule_pivot", 1)
If pivotAttribute = False Then %CanCreate% = False Else %CanCreate% = True End If End Function
